vsParam:
Bergamot Sensei!
We were told that you want to see us!

Did you finish the item on that recipe
we saw earlier!?

You are here... Unfortunately, I didn't.
I am still a step away from the synthesis.

Oh, what a pity!
So what do you want from us today?

To make that item, I need one more item made of
alchemy as ingredient.

I have prepared all other materials, I hope that
[px] can help me synthesize that item I need.
Are you willing to help me?
Such an important job... Please give it to me!

That's a quick answer.
Don't feel stressed, just do it like usual.

Don't worry.
I only give it to you because I believe that you can.

Anyway, try it first, [px]!
Sensei, please tell us what to make!
Okay, you need to make this.
[px] should be able to make this, right?

Send it to me directly once you are done.
I'll be waiting.

Bergamot Sensei!
The item you want is done!
Faster than I thought. Let me see...

... Uh? B, Bergamot Sensei
just smiled!?

H, how can you describe a lecturer as kawaii!
Of course I'd smile when I should. Gee...

Never mind... With your help, the preparation is basically done.
We can start the synthesis soon.

Uh, perfect.
Such a quality is sufficient for the synthesis.

And the preparation is basically done.
We can start the synthesis soon.

Up to now, all the syntheses
were completed by myself...

But it feel alright to
work together with others.
Looks like I did the right thing asking you to help, [px].

Hee hee, sensei just compliments you,
[px]!

Okay! Let's work harder,
and make sensei trust us more!
